name: Black IceTassets
description: The black Ice tassests are a beautiful way to protect your upper legs. This hight fantasy pair of tassets come in a two tone black and white pattern that has its own unique shape.

name: Soldiers Belt Shield
description: This pair of Soldiers Belt Shields can easily be attached to ant warriorâ€™s sword belt. This tasset style of protection is made from mild steel and is perfect for the light infantry soldier.

name: Faulds and Tassets, Dark
description: Our polished faulds and tassets have a gothic look and feel to them and are fully articulated. These medieval inspired fantasy tassets provide protection on the upper thigh. They allow the knight a full range of movement and security against blows when on the battle field.

name: Undead tassets
description: Evil Overlords and warriors alike recognize the value in appearance. This set of undead tassets accomplishes the task and is a balance between protection and functionality.  Lend a bit of decorum to your larp character before you set forth into battle.

name: Warrior Tassets
description: This set of Warrior Larp Tassets protects the upper leg from blows and can be used without the use of a breast plate.  A large belt with adjustable suspenders holds the three sets of lames protect your thighs and privates from hits and does not hinder movement. The tassets may be placed under the breastplate for added protection or used alone for dramatic...

name: Undead skull plate tasset
description: The Undead Skull Plate serves one purpose but has a multitude of ways to use it.  The belt loops allow you to use one or many to create your own unique look.  The raised skull pattern however reveals your true identity, and show the blackness in your heart.

name: Mercenary Tassets
description: These tassets fit perfectly with the mercenary armor cuirass, matching holes makes this pair of thigh protectors a perfect fit.

description: This pair of Dark Warrior Tassets shields the thighs of the legs from sword blows and can function well without using a breastplate.
